snippet: Twenty-nine others were injured after a blast and a gas leak damaged the Bhilai steel plant in Chhattisgarh State.
abstract: Spokesman for government-run Bhilai steel plant in Chhattisgarh State in India says at least six people were killed and 29 more injured in explosion and subsequent gas pipeline leak.
lead_paragraph: Twenty-nine others were injured after a blast and a gas leak damaged the Bhilai steel plant in Chhattisgarh State.
